title: Jergens Glow Face Daily Moisturizer Sunscreen SPF 20, Fair to Med, 2 Ounce
description: Jergens natural glow healthy complexion face spy daily facial moisturizer, fair to medium, 2 ounce.

title: Jergens Natural Glow Daily Moisturizer, Medium Skin Tones - 7.5 Oz (3 Pack)
description: Creates a healthy, summer glow all year long just by moisturizing. With natural botanicals & a subtle skin darkening complex. Moisturize into the glow. Designed specifically for medium skin tones, Jergens natural glow Daily Moisturizer delivers the optimum amount of naturally glowing color to even out and enrich the appearance of your skin. The maximum depth and intensity of color will be reached after about one week of daily use. Made in USA.
